languages.text: {n}Вы отворачиваетесь — и разрываете окутавший вас морок: тут же нестерпимый жар заставляет вашу кожу пылать, а голоса скрытых дымом людей набирают в силе... и наполняются надеждой, когда вы и ваши спутники, выкрикивая указания, ведете их назад. В своем порыве вы напрочь забываете о Теодоре, а когда оглядываетесь назад — не видите ничего, кроме чадящего пламени.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы отворачиваетесь — и разрываете окутавший вас морок: тут же нестерпимый жар заставляет вашу кожу пылать, а голоса скрытых дымом людей набирают в силе... и наполняются надеждой, когда вы и ваши спутники, выкрикивая указания, ведете их назад. В своем порыве вы напрочь забываете о Теодоре, а когда оглядываетесь назад — не видите ничего, кроме чадящего пламени.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You look away — and the illusion breaks. The unbearable heat instantly makes your skin burn, and the voices of the people beyond the shroud of smoke grow stronger... and hopeful, once you and your companions rush back, barking orders and guiding the survivors. In your determination, you completely forget about Theodora, and when you turn your head, you see nothing but the bellowing fire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы отворачиваетесь — и разрываете окутавший вас морок: тут же нестерпимый жар заставляет вашу кожу пылать, а голоса скрытых дымом людей набирают в силе... и наполняются надеждой, когда вы и ваши спутники, выкрикивая указания, ведете их назад. В своем порыве вы напрочь забываете о Теодоре, а когда оглядываетесь назад — не видите ничего, кроме чадящего пламени.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You look back at the screaming stragglers — and the illusion breaks. The unbearable heat instantly makes your skin burn, and the voices of the people beyond the shroud of flames grow stronger... and hopeful, once you and your companions rush to their aid. In your determination, you completely forget about Theodora, and when you turn your head, you see nothing but the bellowing fire.{/n}

{n}You look back at the screaming stragglers — and the illusion breaks. The unbearable heat instantly makes your skin burn, and the voices of the people beyond the shroud of flames grow stronger... and hopeful, once you and your companions rush to their aid. In your determination, you completely forget about Theodora, and when you turn your head, you see nothing but the bellowing fire.{/n}

{n}You look back — and the illusion breaks. The unbearable heat instantly makes your skin burn, and the voices of the people beyond the shroud of smoke grow stronger... and hopeful, once you and your companions rush back, barking orders and guidances. In your determination, you completely forget about Theodora, and when you turn your head, you see nothing but the bellowing fire.{/n}

{n}You look away — and the illusion breaks. The unbearable heat instantly makes your skin burn, and the voices of the people beyond the shroud of smoke grow stronger... and hopeful, once you and your companions rush back, barking orders and guiding the survivors. In your determination, you completely forget about Theodora, and when you turn your head, you see nothing but the bellowing fire.{/n}

In your determination, you completely forget about Theodora, and when you turn your head, you see nothing but the bellowing fire.{/n}

{n}You look away — and the illusion breaks. The unbearable heat instantly makes your skin burn, and the voices of the people beyond the shroud of smoke grow stronger... and hopeful, once you and your companions rush back, barking orders and guiding the survivors. In your determination, you completely forget about Theodora, and when you turn your head, you see nothing but the bellowing fire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你转过了头，眼前的幻象消失了。难以忍受的高温让你的皮肤瞬间变得发烫。烟雾之外，人们的声音变得越来越响亮……而且充满了希望的意味。你和你的伙伴们冲了回去，高声下达着命令，引导幸存者前往安全的区域。你心中充满了决心，完全忘记了西奥多拉的事情。当你转过头时，那里除了汹涌的烈焰之外，已经什么都没有了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You look away — and the illusion breaks. The unbearable heat instantly makes your skin burn, and the voices of the people beyond the shroud of smoke grow stronger... and hopeful, once you and your companions rush back, barking orders and guiding the survivors. In your determination, you completely forget about Theodora, and when you turn your head, you see nothing but the bellowing fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你转过了头，眼前的幻象消失了。难以忍受的高温让你的皮肤瞬间变得发烫。烟雾之外，人们的声音变得越来越响亮……而且充满了希望的意味。你和你的伙伴们冲了回去，高声下达着命令，引导幸存者前往安全的区域。你心中充满了决心，完全忘记了西奥多拉的事情。当你转过头时，那里除了汹涌的烈焰之外，已经什么都没有了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Apartas la mirada y la ilusión se rompe. El insoportable calor quema tu piel y las voces de la gente que hay tras la humareda se vuelven más fuertes... y esperanzadas al ver que tus compañeros y tú retrocedéis para dar órdenes y guiar a los supervivientes. Durante este arrebato de determinación, olvidas momentáneamente a Theodora. Cuando vuelves a mirar solo ves el fuego, bramando.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You look away — and the illusion breaks. The unbearable heat instantly makes your skin burn, and the voices of the people beyond the shroud of smoke grow stronger... and hopeful, once you and your companions rush back, barking orders and guiding the survivors. In your determination, you completely forget about Theodora, and when you turn your head, you see nothing but the bellowing fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Apartas la mirada y la ilusión se rompe. El insoportable calor quema tu piel y las voces de la gente que hay tras la humareda se vuelven más fuertes... y esperanzadas al ver que tus compañeros y tú retrocedéis para dar órdenes y guiar a los supervivientes. Durante este arrebato de determinación, olvidas momentáneamente a Theodora. Cuando vuelves a mirar solo ves el fuego, bramando.{/n}

languages.text: {n}目をそらすと…幻想が崩れる。耐え難い熱さで肌が一瞬で焼けるようになり、煙に覆われた向こう側の人々の声が大きくなってくる…そして、あなたと従者が急いで戻って命令を出し、生存者を誘導すると、希望が満ちる。決意のあまり、あなたはシオドーラのことを完全に忘れ、振り向くと、そこには燃え盛る炎しか見えない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You look away — and the illusion breaks. The unbearable heat instantly makes your skin burn, and the voices of the people beyond the shroud of smoke grow stronger... and hopeful, once you and your companions rush back, barking orders and guiding the survivors. In your determination, you completely forget about Theodora, and when you turn your head, you see nothing but the bellowing fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目をそらすと…幻想が崩れる。耐え難い熱さで肌が一瞬で焼けるようになり、煙に覆われた向こう側の人々の声が大きくなってくる…そして、あなたと従者が急いで戻って命令を出し、生存者を誘導すると、希望が満ちる。決意のあまり、あなたはテオドラのことを完全に忘れ、振り向くと、そこには燃え盛る炎しか見えない。{/n}
{n}目をそらすと…幻想が崩れる。耐え難い熱さで肌が一瞬で焼けるようになり、煙に覆われた向こう側の人々の声が大きくなってくる…そして、あなたと従者が急いで戻って命令を出し、生存者を誘導すると、希望が満ちる。決意のあまり、あなたはシオドーラのことを完全に忘れ、振り向くと、そこには燃え盛る炎しか見えない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dès que vous détournez le regard, l'illusion se brise. La chaleur insoutenable vous brûle instantanément la peau, tandis que les voix au-delà du nuage de fumée se font plus fortes... et pleines d'espoir. Vous reculez avec vos compagnons et donnez des ordres pour guider les rescapés. Dans votre détermination, vous avez complètement oublié Théodora. Lorsque vous vous retournez, vous ne distinguez rien d'autre que le feu rugissant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You look away — and the illusion breaks. The unbearable heat instantly makes your skin burn, and the voices of the people beyond the shroud of smoke grow stronger... and hopeful, once you and your companions rush back, barking orders and guiding the survivors. In your determination, you completely forget about Theodora, and when you turn your head, you see nothing but the bellowing fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dès que vous détournez le regard, l'illusion se brise. La chaleur insoutenable vous brûle instantanément la peau, tandis que les voix au-delà du nuage de fumée se font plus fortes... et pleines d'espoir. Vous reculez avec vos compagnons et donnez des ordres pour guider les rescapés. Dans votre détermination, vous avez complètement oublié Théodora. Lorsque vous vous retournez, vous ne distinguez rien d'autre que le feu rugissant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du wendest den Blick ab – und die Illusion zerbricht. Die unerträgliche Hitze verbrennt sofort deine Haut, und die Stimmen der Menschen hinter dem Rauch werden lauter ... und hoffnungsvoller, sobald du und deine Gefährten zurückeilen, Befehle erteilen und den Überlebenden helfen. In deinem entschlossenen Vorgehen vergisst du Theodora völlig, und als du dich nach ihr umdrehst, siehst du nichts als loderndes Feuer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You look away — and the illusion breaks. The unbearable heat instantly makes your skin burn, and the voices of the people beyond the shroud of smoke grow stronger... and hopeful, once you and your companions rush back, barking orders and guiding the survivors. In your determination, you completely forget about Theodora, and when you turn your head, you see nothing but the bellowing fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du wendest den Blick ab – und die Illusion zerbricht. Die unerträgliche Hitze verbrennt sofort deine Haut, und die Stimmen der Menschen hinter dem Rauch werden lauter ... und hoffnungsvoller, sobald du und deine Gefährten zurückeilen, Befehle erteilen und den Überlebenden helfen. In deinem entschlossenen Vorgehen vergisst du Theodora völlig, und als du dich nach ihr umdrehst, siehst du nichts als loderndes Feuer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kafanı çeviriyorsun ve illüzyon bozuluyor. Katlanılmaz ısı anında tenini yakıyor ve duman perdesi ardındaki insanların seslerinin güçlendiğini duyuyorsun. Sesler hem güçleniyor hem de yoldaşlarınla onlar için geri dönüp emirler yağdırarak sağ kalanları kurtardığını gördüklerinden umutla doluyor. Bu azimli çıkışın sırasında Theodora aklından tamamen çıkıyor. Dönüp baktığındaysa harlanan ateşten başka bir şey görmüyorsun.{/n}

In your determination, you completely forget about Theodora, and when you turn your head, you see nothing but the bellowing fire.{/n}
